file_content.text: Go ahead and gloat, you son of a schutta! I'll find a way out of here! And then you'll pay!
It's not fair. I was going to do great things. The galaxy was going to remember my name.
You're sad, Tarro. You should suffer as long as possible for what you did to Braden.
Come on, Mako. We're done here.
We need to keep moving.
Enough, Mako, he's broken.
I think he gets the picture.
This is for Braden. Jory. Soongh. And me.
No, we finish it. [Kill Tarro]
It's over, guys....
I can't believe you two are in the same business. Do us all a favor and put him out of his misery.
He can do it himself. Let's go.
We're done here.
I want him to have time to regret everything he's done.
That's letting him off easy.
No! Don't leave me here! Not like this! Damn you!
Anything to get him to shut up.
With pleasure. [Kill Tarro]
So what are you waiting for? Just finish it.
You're not worth any more of my time.
It's already finished.
For once in your life, be a man. End it yourself.
Why don't you, coward?
You can't walk away from me! Kill me! Do it!
This is for Braden, dirtbag.
With pleasure.
It's not... fair....
So you're still alive, eh? You might be worth killing after all.
Hurry up and let me out of here, so we can settle this once and for all. Unless facing me as an equal frightens you.
You're not my equal. You've failed.
I'm not impressed.
So you're a coward? Is that it?
The cell suits you. Brings out the scumbag.
I like seeing you like this.
Of course. Someone like you could never dream of defeating me. All you can do is ogle like some insignificant bystander.
I should shoot you where you stand.
I can kill you right now.
These cell doors are ray shielded. If you want to kill me, you'll have to let me out.
Come on, surprise me. Open the door and face me like a warrior.
Let's say I do. What then?
And if I let you out?
My equipment's right over there, in that lockbox. I suit up, then we end this, something I should've done long ago.
This man doesn't seem to like you, hunter. Can't imagine why.
If you're a real warrior, you'll do it. Come on!
I think I'll leave you in there.
I like you where you are.
I challenge you! I demand we settle this. It's what Soongh would have wanted. It's what Braden would have wanted.
Braden would have wanted to see you just how you are.
From what I hear, he deserves to be blasted. A lot. You really gonna pass up this opportunity?
He's just a distraction. It's all he's ever been.
We leave him.
Braden'd want me to see this through.
No, I'll fight.
Of course he would.
Yeah, I'd probably regret not crushing his pride myself.
You're right, Gault.
Only one way to find out.
Don't let his death go unpunished. Let me out! Avenge Braden!
Where's the fun in that? I want to hear you beg.
Ask me nicely, loser.
Hmph, figures. You are a lowlife.
Fine! I'm begging you! I can't die like this! Please!
You don't deserve a warrior's death, scumbag.
Let's leave him. Let him die when the ship is ripped to pieces!
Works for me.
Agreed.
I want him to know who the better hunter is before he dies.
He's the coward. Not me.
Yes! Stay out of this, street rat, this is between us!
I want the pleasure of killing him myself.
Then I won't hear him scream.
Of course you do! This has always been about us!
Revenge and humiliation go well together. I say let him out. Besides, how could you ignore a face like that?
Listen to your friend! Let me out of this cage!
Let me out of this cage!
Fine, I'll give you what you want.
Okay, we fight. [Free Tarro]
Now I get my gear, suit up and we finish this, right here, right now.
You got thirty seconds.
Hurry up.
Trust me, I'll make this worth your while.
Take your time. These are the last moments of your life.
Go ahead, it won't help.
We'll see, won't we.
You idiot. No real hunter would've given up his advantage and allowed a dangerous enemy to arm himself.
If you were a dangerous enemy, that might be true.
Says you.
Killing you is going to feel so damn good.
No, I just have honor.
I'm not afraid to fight fair.
You sound like that old fool Hedarr Soongh. And just like him, you'll find that honor gets you nothing.
This will be satisfying.
Die, you insignificant worm!
I just needed to get a clear shot.
No, now you die. [Shoot Tarro]
So... you are a coward... after all....
You'll die alone and forgotten, Tarro. So long.
Nah.
You're a lousy beggar. Sit and rot.
Pathetic, enjoy your stay.
No! You can't let me die like this! I'm Tarro Blood, you worthless piece of filth! I'm the future of the Mandalorians!
So long, slimeball.
This will be more comfortable for you--my friend here would have killed you slowly.
Let me out, damn you! You can't do this to me! I'm Tarro Blood! Tarro Blood!
